com.airg.android.device

Class UnitConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.airg.android.device.UnitConverter

  • public final class UnitConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to convert between different size units in Android.

                     int fromUnit,
                     int toUnit)
        Convert a dimension to a complex size
        Parameters:
        f - dimension value
        fromUnit - source dimension unit
        toUnit - target dimension unit
        Returns:
        converted dimension value (in pixels or portions thereof)
